content.en: Enhanced DE Algorithms: A set of scientific abstracts analyzed the performance of various differential evolution (DE) algorithms for global optimization problems. The algorithms were found to enhance local search ability, convergence rate, exploration and exploitation capabilities, and solution quality. They generally outperformed other DE variants and non-DE algorithms on benchmark functions and real-world problems, and showed competitive performance compared to other state-of-the-art DE algorithms. The proposed algorithms significantly improved optimization performance, handled large-scale optimization problems, and achieved better convergence speed and population diversity.
content.da: Forbedrede DE-algoritmer: Et sæt videnskabelige abstrakter analyserede ydeevnen af forskellige differential evolution (DE)-algoritmer til globale optimeringsproblemer. Algoritmerne blev fundet at forbedre lokal søgeevne, konvergenshastighed, udforsknings- og udnyttelsesevner samt løsningskvalitet. De overgik generelt andre DE-varianter og ikke-DE-algoritmer på benchmark funktioner og reelle problemer, og viste konkurrencedygtig ydeevne sammenlignet med andre avancerede DE-algoritmer. De foreslåede algoritmer forbedrede optimeringsydelsen markant, håndterede store optimeringsproblemer og opnåede bedre konvergenshastighed og populationsdiversitet.
